thread.title: Tioga Downs to learn its casino fate today
thread.title_full: Tioga Downs to learn its casino fate today - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Tioga Downs to learn its casino fate today
text: After two years of lobbying, Tioga Downs in the Southern Tier will learn later Wednesday whether it will receive preliminary approval for one of four New York casino licenses. The state Gaming Facility Location Board will meet at 2 p.m. Wednesday in Manhattan to announce its decision on the Tioga Downs racino.
